meanings.definition: Resembling a reed in appearance or structure.
meanings.sent1: The tall, thin grass in the garden looked reedlike in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The flute had a reedlike shape at the top.
meanings.sent3: The reedlike stems of the flowers swayed gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her hair cascaded down her back, reedlike and flowing.
meanings.sent5: The reedlike columns of the ancient temple stood tall and majestic.
